TITLE: Bacchae, line 1
DESCRIPTION: Fragments on which the beginning of the 1st line of Euripides' Bacchae has been written 3 or 4 times.
SUBJECTS: Papyrus, Bacchae, Euripides, Ancient Greece, Literature
CONTENT:
1 column (4 lines) written on recto along the fibers.
Large schoolboy hand.
Papyrus has been used before, probably for an account.
Traces on verso.
